name: Otto Samson founder of Lifförsäkrings AB Nordstjernan
obverse: Bust of Otto Samson facing left.
reverse: Inscription in 6 lines. Above the inscription is a star. To the right of the inscription is an olive branch.
description: This medal was made to commemorate Otto Samson, the founder of Lifförsäkrings AB Nordstjernan,
an insurance company headquartered in Stockholm and founded in 1871.
